reviewText: One of the best softcore porn flicks out there, 2 main hotties get it on in multiple scenes.  Only one small minus no women-women scenes.  This movie is a must buy, a great flick, don't pass it off because Amazon does not feature a cover preview.  There is basically non-stop women action in this one, from the beginning to the end, a must buy, I also recommend Femalien! peace...

First, Night Shade breaks no new ground.  It is a movie that opens with a steamy remembrance scene that let us know how much the main character loved his late wife, and goes on to reveal that she isn't quite dead.  Hmmm...
  X rated for for the explicit sex scenes, there is a fair amount of vampire  action in Night Shade, which I had to wait a long time to see.  But the  characters are interesting, or laughable (particularly the police  detective), and the vampiresses get to do their stuff more than once in the  film, so I was left with a good impression.
